sentences.en: A diode used in this manner is called a rectifier.
sentences.cn: 按这种方式使用的二极管叫做整流管.

sentences.en: A high - power diode laser power supply controlled by microprocessor is presented.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种利用单片机控制的大功率半导体激光驱动电源.

sentences.en: A semiconductor diode array that is programmed by fusing or burning out diode junctions.
sentences.cn: 一种半导体二极管阵列,通过熔断或烧断二极管的结来实现编程过程.

sentences.en: ABB will design, supply, build and 24 sets of high-power diode rectifier systems for four aluminum pot lines.
sentences.cn: ABB将为四条铝罐生产线设计、供应和建造24套高功率的二极管整流器系统。

sentences.en: All NXP products manufactured by axial diode glass plant of Tak Cheong.
sentences.cn: 德昌轴形二极管车间制造的所有NXP产品.

sentences.en: Diode differentiation capitalism can only create more poor people dependent wealthy.
sentences.cn: 资本主义二极分化,只能造就更多穷人养富人.

sentences.en: Each diode is cut from a wafer of crystals layered over a base of silicon or sapphire.
sentences.cn: 每一个二极管都从硅（或者蓝宝石为衬底的）晶片上切割下来。

sentences.en: Electrical noise caused by diode or stator malfunction is not acceptable.
sentences.cn: 因二极管或转子失灵而引起的发电噪音是不合格的发电机.

sentences.en: Far from it. Devices are being built that can manipulate phonons, allowing them to flow in one direction only, for example - the thermal equivalent of a diode.
sentences.cn: 可以操作声子并只让它们向一个方向流动的设备正在被建造，这是二极管的热等价物。

sentences.en: If one or more elemental equations are nonlinear, as is the case for a diode, then the overall system is nonlinear.
sentences.cn: 如果一个或多个基础方程是非线性的，例如在应用二极管的场合，那么整个系统也就成了非线性的。

sentences.en: In other words, collector current mimics, or mirrors, diode current.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 集电极电流模仿或镜像了二极管电流.

sentences.en: Laser diode emits the elliptical divergent Gauss beam depended on temperature.
sentences.cn: 半导体激光器发出的是一束发散的椭园形高斯光束,并具有温度依赖性.

sentences.en: Surface mount switching diode . Reverse voltage 75 V. Rectified current 250 mA.
sentences.cn: 表面贴装开关二极管. 75五,反向电压整流电流250毫安.

sentences.en: The current flows in one direction in a diode.
sentences.cn: 电流在二极管中只朝单方向流动.

sentences.en: The diode is used routinely in many kinds of electronic circuits.
sentences.cn: 二极管早已作为常规器件应用于多种电路中.

sentences.en: The metal oxide semiconductor field effect transistor (MOSFET) works on a similar principle, but the diode is buried within the MOSFET.
sentences.cn: 在金属氧化物半导体场效应晶体管（MOSFET）的作品在一个类似的原则，但二极管的MOSFET内掩埋。

sentences.en: The odd harmonics increment mainly results from the diode - conduction asymmetry.
sentences.cn: 其中,二极管导通非对称性是导致奇次谐波增大的主要原因.

sentences.en: The origin of � � UF of automobile silicon rectifier diode is introduced here.
sentences.cn: 介绍汽车硅整流二极管△UF的 由来,详细阐述实验中影响△UF值的各项因素及降低△UF的方法.

sentences.en: The rf power exceeds the sum of the individual diode output.
sentences.cn: 输出的射频功率已超过了所有单管输出功率之和.

sentences.en: This diode produces about nine times more radiant power than that one.
sentences.cn: 这只二级管的耗散功率比那只大8倍.

phrases.tran_cn: 发光二极管；电致发光片
光电二极体，光敏二极管
稳压二极管；齐纳二极管

trans.tran_en: a piece of electrical equipment that makes an electrical current flow in one direction
